resources.string:
Congratulations on your first step toward taking control of your schedule and eliminating lateness in your professional and personal life.

This quick tour is simple to use: swipe left and right to move between pages, and swipe up and down to scroll.

Now swipe left to get started!

Turning on the NeverBeLate™ Advance Warning system is simple. On the main screen you will find a checkbox just the like the one below. Just check the box, and then rest easy knowing that NeverBeLate™ is working behind the scenes to keep you on time to all of your events.
Well, there is actually one more thing that NeverBeLate™ needs to work properly. Swipe left to learn what it is!
